casebody.data:
In the Matter of Michael J. ROTONDO, Appellant,
v.
Angela C. GASPARINI, Respondent. (And Two Other Proceedings) 2017-1216 Court of Appeals of New York. January 16, 2018

Motion for leave to appeal dismissed upon the ground that the Court of Appeals does not have jurisdiction to entertain it (see NY Const, art VI, § 3 ; CPLR 5602 ).

Motion for poor person relief dismissed as academic.

Motion for a stay dismissed as academic.
